messages.message:
x-posting, anyone having issues with file-system locally atm?
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011FHLBN8N/p1722627952990839

Yeah it seems related to this thread: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1722287077707969

I was able to get my local file service healthy again by re-adding the keys removed in this PR to my env-local.json: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/60613/files

we are going to revoke that shared S3 key soon, you should be able to use the S3 credentials from your own aws account, can you use that instead? sorry we have to do this to cope with compliance requirement
sure, which aws account do we use? I assume `instabase-dev`?
it should be instabase (083423824311) account with BaseEng role
